duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day-to-day campaigns within the Festival division, including pitch and press release drafting, reporting, pitching, research, opportunity coordination, logistics management, influencer program management, radio relations, and on-site festival work.
Coordinate editorial relationships across festival campaigns and develop creative angles for editorial pitching.

Update campaign planners, coordinate earned media opportunities, and manage influencer program by keeping the database updated and presenting ticket trade coverage opportunities across the festival roster.
Coordinate commercial and college radio relations for festivals, attend on-site festival events, and work with festival team management to implement earned media opportunities on-site.
Coordinate social media takeovers, distribute social content, and maintain a shared contact database.
Ensure the use of company project management tools, contribute to inter-team communications, and weekly calls with promo and artist teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Preferred)
